content:
you know as hard as this may be for you to believe of your tenderhearted egostroking TV columnist sometimes all of these shows I rave about do something so seemingly kind and generous that all it does is piss me off PERIOD Like I watched this weeks True Blood minisode which was a very thoughtful gesture on HBOs part PERIOD But instead I bit the hand that fed me PERIOD You know what Fuck you HBO PERIOD How dare you tease me with girlonPam action PERIOD And how dare Fox give hope to all these annoying godawful wannabe ingnues spamming my Facebook with their pointless Glee dreams PERIOD As if stomaching Cory Monteiths voice every week isnt bad enough PERIOD

Where do we turn when primetime is full of suck All  other channels baby PERIOD

Whether youre partial to The Biography Channel on a slow Sunday afternoon or a Lifetime Original Movie on a lonely Friday night I think we can all agree nothing beats the random timeconsuming shows that are always there during our most boring times of need PERIOD And such variety Click  some bro lost millions to a chick with a straight flush PERIOD Click  anthropologists discover that Cleopatra met aliens PERIOD Click   minutes to make a wedding dress out of glitter PERIOD Click  hot girls gone wild PERIOD Click  Golden Girls gone wild PERIOD Heck you can even watch Hannah Montana if you want to Although we will judge you. instead of bombarding you with morals or content these shows let your mind wander free PERIOD I like to just leave the TV on in the background while I do pretty much everything from cooking to showering PERIOD Yes my electricity bill is atrocious but I also at any time can tune in and learn something PERIOD Like how bullfrogs hunt or why you shouldnt Botox your eyelids PERIOD Hey that little girl saved her best friend with the Heimlich maneuver she learned off SpongeBob. you cant tell me that wasnt a slap in the face of the public education system PERIOD

As I always tell people nothing says more about a person than what they will watch when theres nothing else on PERIOD If youre lying on the couch with your latest conquest for some postsex TV and he turns on the Weather Channel you know theres a problem PERIOD I am a Food Network and Travel Channel girl myself though I have been known to throw a little Animal Planet in my day PERIOD Most girls up the ante with some TLC and Bravo whereas guys often gravitate toward Spike MythBusters or ESPN1through188633 PERIOD Theres no end to the mlange of TV labels you can give to someone in order to identify their personality PERIOD For example if I said Shes such a MTVEABC Family you would know exactly what kind of a person were looking at here PERIOD Its like classifying a species PERIOD

So the next time youre at home bored watching whatever it is you watch consider what your random television choices say about you PERIOD Or dont you know if you watch something like QVC PERIOD In that case youre better off not knowing PERIOD

Forgetting to take off the ratty AF1s at the potluck most Asian households dont take kindly to shoes in the house

Wearing your only red tshirt to every final Red is a lucky color in many cultures especially Chinese cultures

Putting spiders in your friends wedding dress for good luck Has its origins in old english folklore and represents abundance for the couple

Accidentally summoned a ghost by leaving their chopsticks straight up A superstition that has Chinese origins because the chopsticks are reminiscent of funeral incense

Didnt like your friends significant other so they gifted them an umbrella The word for umbrella san sounds like the word for divorce in Chinese

Believing in horoscopes The modern western zodiac actually came from Babylonian astrology

Walked backwards in Portugal to live out the Faust fantasy In Portugal walking backwards allows the devil to know exactly where you are

Stole a raven from the tower of london as reparations According to UK superstition if there arent  ravens in the tower the kingdom will fall

Breaks a knuckle knocking on wood for good scores on finals Knocking on wood may have originated from the Celts and their love for tree spirits

Drunkenly rearranging their apartment for the feng shui at  AM A Chinese cultural practice that harmonizes a person with the energies of the environment around them

Left out their middle name on their taxes because the Fae run the IRS Giving the Fae your full name gives them power over you and the IRS has too much

Hit by a car but the license plate had an angel number Beyond just blowing up on TikTok angel numbers were invented by.. PERIOD Pythagoras
